overview: The Byrds are a young couple both working as reporters but for different newspapers. When Mike invents the story of how they had the idea to make a baby his wife at first becomes furious about his article but then she adapts to it and starts to write the story from her side in the other newspaper. Making the articles reality they are now acpecting their first child...
tagline: A journalist and her husband, an editor, present their very different thoughts on her pregnancy in their respective columns and become a big hit with their fans.
title: Warm Hearts, Cold Feet
